attributes.action: make businesses with a turn over of over 500,000 pounds pay there invoices within 30 days to help small business with cash flow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The delay in paying invoices from large companies is causing severe cash flow problems and forcing small firms to go bust.30 days is far to long really fourteen would be better. Firms who do not pay within 30 days are damaging the british economy and there should be a law that if the invoice is not paid they should be made bankrupt and all their creditors paid.
